title: His Every Touch
description: Kallie Young has finally succumbed to bad boy Hunter Reardon's advances. She's even gone so far as to sign a contract that gives him the right to do with her as he pleases.But as it turns out, Hunter wants more still. And when Hunter's increasing demands interfere with her own personal responsibilities, Kallie will have to make difficult choices. As her nights with Hunter grow hotter and more intimate, other problems surface. Hunter has a past that won't remain hidden forever, and Kallie is more and more determined to find answers--even if her contract specifically forbids her from doing so. In the end, she will be left wondering if her latest revelation about Hunter's life is more than she can possibly bear.
author: Kelly Favor
